name: Hidden - Demo
description:
Hidden is a short horror game.
Ahmad and Usin planned to do ghost hunting activity in the infamous abandoned hospital that has more cases of dead body found and even murder committed. While Usin which is the character you're playing head to the hospital and things started to get abnormal. He was teleported to another dimension and forced to faces the evil spirits. Will he find a way out or meet death?The evil spirits may look impossible to overcome, but think carefully.
It's either escape, survive, or die.DEMO version- No voice acting added and sound effects reduced.
